title: How AI could detect signs of mental illness
description: Researchers in Japan used artificial intelligence to analyse people’s face movements and detect subtle signs of depression
content:
Artificial intelligence could be used to analyse people’s facial expressions and detect signs of depression, new research suggests.

title: AI CEO says technology ‘moving very quickly,’ could soon replace more jobs
description: By Samantha Delouya, CNN (CNN) — Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei doubled down on his warning that artificial intelligence could soon cause mass unemployment, even as the technology’s current capabilities lag behind many predictions. title: AI Rush Prompts More Investors to Increase Focus
description: India is seeing an increasing number of artificial intelligence-focused venture capital funds. They are betting on Indian founders building in AI and include areas such as consumer-facing apps, tooling, infrastructure and enterprise technology.

title: Phuket forges ahead with AI City plan

title: China Tells Companies to Stop Buying Nvidia’s Repurposed AI Chip
description: China’s cyberspace regulator has instructed companies including Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. to halt orders for Nvidia Corp.’s RTX Pro 6000D, a semiconductor for workstations that can be repurposed for artificial-intelligence applications.

title: AI may boost global trade by nearly 40 per cent
description: Artificial intelligence could boost the value of global trade by almost 40 per cent by 2040 thanks to cost reductions and productivity gains, the World Trade Organization said Wednesday.
content:

title: Nvidia’s UK Partner Is a 16-Month-Old Crypto Mining Spinout
description: Nscale, a little known British data center company that spun out of a crypto miner last year, has found itself at the forefront of a massive artificial intelligence-fueled data center boom.
